Key Match Events: Kings outscored the Celtics 61-42 in the 2nd half
Kings held the Celtics to under 100 points for only the second time this year
Pre-Game Insights: Experts favored the Celtics to win based on their recent performance
Doug Christie emphasized the importance of strong perimeter defense
Post-Match Reflections: Kings fans are ecstatic and proud of the team's performance
Coach Christie praised the team's effort and energy
Kings are now at the 9th seed and are climbing back to.500
Fans are hopeful for the team's future and the possibility of making the playoffs
Miscellaneous Highlights: Keegan Murray was 12/22 from 3 in his past 3 games
DeMar DeRozan was called 'President of the Middy Committee'
Domas Sabonis played exceptionally well with 28 rebounds
The Kings' defense was strong, outrebounding the Celtics 56-43
The Kings won in Boston, which is considered a significant achievement
Others: Domas Sabonis is almost tearing up after the game
Monte McNair is drafting a rookie who shows confidence and variety in his 3s and drives on offense
Kings fans are calling for a trade of De’Aaron Fox, suggesting he is not worth the max contract
There is discussion about trading De’Aaron Fox for a top player or multiple good players and picks in return
